name: Squire's Proving
description:
As a young squire training to be a knight, you hear noises from the local town; seems like an enemy invasion, but perhaps something more sinister is afoot...

A conceptual point and click action adventure RPG.

Features

  • Level progression
  • AI chase and patrol behavior
  • Multiple enemy and weapon types

Camera Controls

Q/E - Camera panning

Scroll wheel - Zoom in/out

Misc. Controls

S/L - Save and Load

Delete - Delete save file
